item.description: I wasn't going to book 2 events on the same day but, I need a movie nite! This is more than half off a reg. movie...So, your cost for Sat. Movie Nite is only $5.00. We'll meet at 6:45 pm inside the cinema. We have space for 5 more women. I am only looking for you "Yes" people. I'm doing some research on what's playing...We'll talk about it when we all get together.

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Cheap Night At The Movies
